info.official_title: Multicenter Phase 3 Trial Comparing Neoadjuvant Ipilimumab Plus Nivolumab Versus Standard Adjuvant Nivolumab in Macroscopic Stage III Melanoma - NADINA

inclusion_lines.line: * Women of childbearing potential (WOCP) must use appropriate method(s) of contraception, i.e. methods with a failure rate of <1% per year when used consistently and correctly, to avoid pregnancy for 23 weeks post last ipilimumab + nivolumab infusion;

criterions.exact_snippets: Women of childbearing potential (WOCP)
must use appropriate method(s) of contraception, i.e. methods with a failure rate of <1% per year when used consistently and correctly
to avoid pregnancy for 23 weeks post last ipilimumab + nivolumab infusion

inclusion_lines.line: * Cytologically or histologically confirmed resectable stage III melanoma of cutaneous or unknown primary origin with one or more macroscopic lymph node metastases (clinical detectable), that can be biopsied and a maximum of 3 additional resectable in-transit metastases. A concurrent resectable primary melanoma is allowed. Clinical detectable lymph nodes are defined as either a palpable node, confirmed as melanoma by pathology, or a non-palpable but enlarged lymph node according to RECISTv1.1 (at least 15 mm in short axis), confirmed as melanoma by pathology, or a PET scan positive lymph node of any size confirmed as melanoma by pathology;

criterions.exact_snippets: Cytologically or histologically confirmed resectable stage III melanoma of cutaneous or unknown primary origin
one or more macroscopic lymph node metastases (clinical detectable)
that can be biopsied
a maximum of 3 additional resectable in-transit metastases
A concurrent resectable primary melanoma is allowed
Clinical detectable lymph nodes are defined as either a palpable node, confirmed as melanoma by pathology
a non-palpable but enlarged lymph node according to RECISTv1.1 (at least 15 mm in short axis), confirmed as melanoma by pathology
a PET scan positive lymph node of any size confirmed as melanoma by pathology

inclusion_lines.line: * Screening laboratory values must meet the following criteria: WBC ≥2.0x109/L, neutrophils ≥1.5x109/L, platelets ≥100x109/L, hemoglobin ≥5.5 mmol/L, creatinine ≤1.5xupper limit of normal (ULN), AST ≤1.5x ULN, ALT ≤1.5x ULN, bilirubin ≤1.5x ULN (except for subjects with Gilbert syndrome who must have a total bilirubin <3.0 mg/dL);

criterions.exact_snippets: neutrophils ≥1.5x109/L
platelets ≥100x109/L
hemoglobin ≥5.5 mmol/L
creatinine ≤1.5xupper limit of normal (ULN)
AST ≤1.5x ULN
ALT ≤1.5x ULN
bilirubin ≤1.5x ULN (except for subjects with Gilbert syndrome who must have a total bilirubin <3.0 mg/dL)

inclusion_lines.line: * No immunosuppressive medications within 6 months prior study inclusion (steroids equivalent to prednisolone ≤10 mg are allowed);

criterions.exact_snippets: No immunosuppressive medications within 6 months prior study inclusion
steroids equivalent to prednisolone ≤10 mg are allowed
Healthy volunteers allowed

inclusion_lines.line: * Males who are sexually active with WOCP must use appropriate method(s) of contraception, i.e. methods with a failure rate of <1% per year when used consistently and correctly, to avoid pregnancy for 31 weeks post last ipilimumab + nivolumab infusion;

criterions.exact_snippets: Males who are sexually active with WOCP must use appropriate method(s) of contraception
methods with a failure rate of <1% per year when used consistently and correctly
to avoid pregnancy for 31 weeks post last ipilimumab + nivolumab infusion

expected_value.unit: weeks post last ipilimumab + nivolumab infusion

inclusion_lines.line: * World Health Organization (WHO) Performance Status 0 or 1;

criterions.exact_snippets: World Health Organization (WHO) Performance Status 0 or 1

inclusion_lines.line: * Patient has signed the Informed Consent document.

criterions.exact_snippets: Patient has signed the Informed Consent document

inclusion_lines.line: Must have minimum age of 16 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 16 Years

inclusion_lines.line: * Men and women, at least 16 years of age;

criterions.exact_snippets: Men and women
at least 16 years of age

inclusion_lines.line: * Patient willing and able to understand the protocol requirements and comply with the treatment schedule, scheduled visits, electronic patient outcome reporting, tumor biopsies and extra blood withdrawal during screening and in case of recurrence, and other requirements of the study;

criterions.exact_snippets: Patient willing and able to understand the protocol requirements
Patient willing and able to ... comply with the treatment schedule
comply with ... scheduled visits
comply with ... electronic patient outcome reporting
criterions.criterion: compliance with electronic patient outcome reporting

criterions.exact_snippets: comply with ... tumor biopsies
comply with ... extra blood withdrawal during screening and in case of recurrence
comply with ... other requirements of the study

inclusion_lines.line: * No prior immunotherapy targeting CTLA-4, PD-1 or PD-L1;

criterions.exact_snippets: No prior immunotherapy targeting CTLA-4, PD-1 or PD-L1
criterions.criterion: prior immunotherapy targeting CTLA-4, PD-1 or PD-L1

inclusion_lines.line: * No other malignancies, except adequately treated and with a cancer-related life-expectancy of more than 5 years;

criterions.exact_snippets: No other malignancies
except adequately treated
cancer-related life-expectancy of more than 5 years
LDH level <1.5x ULN

inclusion_lines.line: * No prior targeted therapy targeting BRAF and/or MEK;

criterions.exact_snippets: No prior targeted therapy targeting BRAF
No prior targeted therapy targeting ... MEK

exclusion_lines.line: * Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding;

criterions.exact_snippets: Women who are pregnant
breastfeeding
Distantly metastasized melanoma
Prior radiotherapy

exclusion_lines.line: * Psychological, familial, sociological, or geographical conditions that potentially hamper compliance with the study protocol and follow-up schedule; those conditions should be discussed with the subject before registration in the trial.

criterions.exact_snippets: Psychological ... conditions that potentially hamper compliance with the study protocol and follow-up schedule
familial ... conditions that potentially hamper compliance with the study protocol and follow-up schedule
sociological ... conditions that potentially hamper compliance with the study protocol and follow-up schedule
geographical conditions that potentially hamper compliance with the study protocol and follow-up schedule

exclusion_lines.line: * Subjects with underlying medical conditions or active infection that, in the investigator's opinion, will make the administration of study drug hazardous or obscure the interpretation of toxicity or adverse events;

criterions.exact_snippets: underlying medical conditions or active infection that, in the investigator's opinion, will make the administration of study drug hazardous or obscure the interpretation of toxicity or adverse events

requirements.expected_value: will make the administration of study drug hazardous or obscure the interpretation of toxicity or adverse events

criterions.exact_snippets: underlying medical conditions or active infection that, in the investigator's opinion, will make the administration of study drug hazardous or obscure the interpretation of toxicity or adverse events

requirements.expected_value: will make the administration of study drug hazardous or obscure the interpretation of toxicity or adverse events

exclusion_lines.line: * Subjects will be excluded if they have known history of testing positive for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) or known acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS);

criterions.exact_snippets: known history of testing positive for human immunodeficiency virus (HIV)
known acquired immunodeficiency syndrome (AIDS)

exclusion_lines.line: * Subjects with any active autoimmune disease or a documented history of autoimmune disease, or history of syndrome that required systemic steroids or immunosuppressive medications. Subjects with resolved childhood asthma/atopy, type I diabetes mellitus, residual hypothyroidism due to autoimmune thyroiditis only requiring hormone replacement, skin disorders (such as vitiligo, psoriasis, or alopecia) not requiring systemic treatment, are permitted to enroll;

criterions.exact_snippets: any active autoimmune disease or a documented history of autoimmune disease
history of syndrome that required systemic steroids or immunosuppressive medications
criterions.criterion: syndrome requiring systemic steroids or immunosuppressive medications

criterions.exact_snippets: resolved childhood asthma/atopy ... are permitted to enroll
type I diabetes mellitus ... are permitted to enroll
residual hypothyroidism due to autoimmune thyroiditis only requiring hormone replacement ... are permitted to enroll
criterions.criterion: residual hypothyroidism due to autoimmune thyroiditis only requiring hormone replacement

criterions.exact_snippets: skin disorders (such as vitiligo, psoriasis, or alopecia) not requiring systemic treatment ... are permitted to enroll
criterions.criterion: skin disorders (such as vitiligo, psoriasis, or alopecia) not requiring systemic treatment

exclusion_lines.line: * Subjects will be excluded if they test positive for hepatitis B virus surface antigen (HBsAg) or hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV antibody), indicating acute or chronic infection. Subjects treated and being at least one year free from HCV are allowed to participate;

criterions.exact_snippets: test positive for hepatitis B virus surface antigen (HBsAg)
test positive for ... hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV antibody)
criterions.criterion: hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV antibody)

criterions.exact_snippets: Subjects treated and being at least one year free from HCV are allowed to participate
criterions.criterion: history of hepatitis C virus infection

exclusion_lines.line: * Use of other investigational drugs before study drug administration 30 days or 5 half-times before study inclusion;

criterions.exact_snippets: Use of other investigational drugs before study drug administration 30 days or 5 half-times before study inclusion

requirements.requirement_type: time since last use before study inclusion

criterions.exact_snippets: Uveal/ocular or mucosal melanoma

exclusion_lines.line: * In-transit metastases only (without cytological or histological proven lymph node involvement)

criterions.exact_snippets: In-transit metastases only
without cytological or histological proven lymph node involvement

requirements.requirement_type: cytological or histological proof of involvement

exclusion_lines.line: * Concurrent medical condition requiring the use of immunosuppressive medications, or immunosuppressive doses of systemic or absorbable topical corticosteroids >10 mg prednisolone daily equivalent;

criterions.exact_snippets: Concurrent medical condition requiring the use of immunosuppressive medications
criterions.criterion: concurrent medical condition requiring immunosuppressive medications

criterions.exact_snippets: immunosuppressive doses of systemic or absorbable topical corticosteroids >10 mg prednisolone daily equivalent
criterions.criterion: systemic or absorbable topical corticosteroid dose

exclusion_lines.line: * Subjects with history of allergy to study drug components or history of severe hypersensitivity reaction to monoclonal antibodies.

criterions.exact_snippets: history of allergy to study drug components
history of severe hypersensitivity reaction to monoclonal antibodies
criterions.criterion: severe hypersensitivity reaction to monoclonal antibodies
